```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r geom_tufteboxplot, cache = TRUE}
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(factor(cyl), mpg))
## with only a point
p + geom_tufteboxplot()
## with a middle box
p + geom_tufteboxplot(median.type="box", fatten=1)
## using lines
p + geom_tufteboxplot(median.type="line")



```
